about_the_game: AC/DC® Premium (2012): perfectly captures the head banging vibe of one of the most legendary rock bands in the world, AC/DC. Designed by Steve Ritchie, the gameplay centers around 12 unique song modes based on the band's biggest hits, including Back in Black, Thunderstruck and Highway to Hell. Complete them all to play the spectacular Encore wizard mode. Tour, Album and Jam Multi-Ball modes can be played separately or combined for huge scoring! The playfield is packed full of features including the Hell's Bell swinging newton ball pendulum, a molded Rock 'n Roll train, the Underworld lower mini-playfield, a TNT Detonator, a moving band members diorama and a rotating ball cannon.

Complete them all to play the spectacular Encore wizard mode. Tour, Album and Jam Multi-Ball modes can be played separately or combined for huge scoring! The playfield is packed full of features including the Hell's Bell swinging newton ball pendulum, a molded Rock 'n Roll train, the Underworld lower mini-playfield, a TNT Detonator, a moving band members diorama and a rotating ball cannon.
name: Stern Pinball Arcade: AC/DC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: DuDual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0 and Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0 and Shader Model 5.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 ghz or better.
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660 or higher. AMD R9-270X or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0 and Shader Model 5.0

Designed by Steve Ritchie, the gameplay centers around 12 unique song modes based on the band's biggest hits, including Back in Black, Thunderstruck and Highway to Hell.
